title: PDC Players Championship Finals: Michael van Gerwen beats Rob Cross to win seventh title
description: Michael van Gerwen beats Rob Cross 11-6 to win his seventh PDC Players Championship Finals title in 10 years.

title: World Cup 2022: Germany's Jamal Musiala again shows his potential as he impresses against Spain
description: Germany teenager Jamal Musiala's performance in the 1-1 draw with Spain again shows how exciting his future in the game can be.

title: Matt Hancock on I'm A Celebrity: Has the controversial MP been forgiven?
description: The ex-health secretary was eliminated from I'm a Celebrity, so was his appearance a failure?

title: Palliative care: 'My dad should not have been expected to die in office hours'
description: Most of the UK lacks consistent round-the-clock care for the terminally ill, research suggests.

title: Matt Hancock: MP finishes third on I'm A Celebrity
description: The former health secretary was beaten by footballer Jill Scott and actor Owen Warner in the final.

title: World Cup 2022: Why Casemiro is key to Brazil's hopes in Qatar - Gilberto Silva
description: Brazil's 2002 World Cup winner Gilberto Silva on why Casemiro could hold the key to his nation's World Cup hopes in Qatar.

title: Bridgend: Three arrested after bodies of two babies found
description: Two men and woman have been arrested after the bodies of two babies were found at a home.

title: World Cup 2022: Spain 1-1 Germany: Niclas Fullkrug equaliser after Alvaro Morata opener
description: A late Germany equaliser against Spain boosts their chances of qualifying for the World Cup last 16.

title: World Cup 2022: Niclas Fullkrug saves Germany with late leveller against Spain
description: Substitutes Alvaro Morata and Niclas Fullkrug score the goals as Spain and Germany play out a 1-1 draw at the World Cup which means that Group E will go down to the final set of fixtures.

title: World Cup 2022: Alvaro Morata gives Spain the lead against Germany
description: Alvaro Morata comes off the bench to give Spain the lead against Germany at the World Cup.

title: World Cup 2022: Alphonso Davies scores Canada's first goal at a finals in loss to Croatia
description: Bayern Munich's Alphonso Davies writes his name in Canadian footballing folklore but his goal is not enough as his country lose to Croatia and exit World Cup.

title: New York: Man rescued seconds before incoming train
description: It was reported the man had accidentally fallen onto the tracks in Harlem, New York.

title: Women's FA Cup: Newcastle set new attendance record outside of a final
description: Newcastle United set a new Women's FA Cup attendance record in their 2-1 second-round win over Barnsley at St James' Park.

title: Tiny Nativity scene in the eye of a needle on display in Birmingham
description: The artist says he takes drugs to slow his heart and creates the tiny engravings between heartbeats.

title: World Cup 2022: Andrej Kramaric Kramaric double eliminates Canada
description: Andrej Kramaric scores twice as Croatia beat Canada 4-1 to knock them out of the World Cup despite Alphonso Davies scoring their first ever men's World Cup goal.

title: World Cup 2022: Belgium were 'afraid to lose' against Morocco, says Roberto Martinez
description: Belgium show "a fear of losing" and "haven't been the best Belgium yet", says boss Roberto Martinez after a World Cup defeat by Morocco.

title: World Cup 2022: Andrej Kramaric gets his second goal as Croatia lead 3-1
description: Andrej Kramaric gets his second goal and Croatia's third as they take 3-1 lead over Canada.

title: World Cup 2022: Iran complain to Fifa over flag change on social media by US
description: Iran's football federation complains to Fifa after the United States removed the emblem of the Islamic Republic from the country's flag in social media posts.

title: World Cup 2022: England don't need 'boos' to know we didn't play well - Marcus Rashford
description: England's players do not "need fans to boo" them to know they have not played well, says forward Marcus Rashford.

title: Watch: Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg highlights
description: A round-up of key moments from Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg on 27 November 2022.

title: World Cup 2022: Alphonso Davies nets Canada's first ever World Cup goal
description: Canada take the lead against Croatia through Alphonso Davies for their first ever goal at a men's World Cup finals.

title: Russian attacks on energy grid amount to genocide, says Ukraine
description: The prosecutor-general tells the BBC Russian attacks aimed at "the full Ukrainian nation".

title: Davis Cup: Canada win title for first time with victory over Australia
description: Canada win the Davis Cup for the first time in the tournament's 122-year history with victory over Australia in the final in Malaga.

title: Matt Hancock reaches the I'm A Celebrity final
description: The former health secretary is among the final three contestants, despite criticism of his appearance.

title: World Cup 2022: Pablo Zabaleta says Belgium showed no fight or 'passion' against Morocco
description: Pablo Zabaleta says Belgium players are "not fighting for their country" after a 2-0 defeat by Morocco in their Group F match at the World Cup.

title: World Cup 2022: Belgium 0-2 Morocco - Abdelhamid Sabiri and Zakaria Aboukhlal seal late win
description: Morocco cause the latest shock at a World Cup that has been full of surprises by beating Belgium with two late goals.

title: World Cup 2022: Abdelhamid Sabiri and Zakaria Aboukhlal secure win for Morocco against Belgium
description: Watch highlights as Abdelhamid Sabiri and Zakaria Aboukhlal's late goals give Morocco a shock 2-0 win over Belgium in their Group F match at the World Cup.

title: World Cup 2022: Thibaut Courtois blunder gifts Abdelhamid Sabiri goal for Morocco against Belgium
description: Watch the moment Belgium's Thibaut Courtois lets an Abdelhamid Sabiri evade his grasp to put Morocco 1-0 up in their Group F match at the World Cup.

title: Man arrested after Sheffield double murder inquiry launched
description: Police launch a double murder inquiry after a man and a woman die in a house in Sheffield.

title: World Cup 2022: Morocco swap goalkeepers before Belgium game
description: Morocco replace goalkeeper Bono with Munir Mohamedi between the pre-match anthems and team photographs against Belgium.

title: Rail reform needed before workers' pay increases, says Transport Secretary
description: The transport secretary says the UK does not have "a proper seven-day railway" network.

title: Wellcome Collection closes 'racist, sexist and ableist' Medicine Man display
description: The Wellcome Collection says its Medicine Man display will end on Sunday after a 15-year run.

title: Energy firms warned over hiking direct debits
description: The government says companies must match bills with customers who are cutting energy use.

title: Italy landslide: Rescuers search for missing people on Ischia island
description: Eleven people are unaccounted for after mud swept away homes and cars on the island of Ischia.

title: World Cup: Wales fans remember Gary Speed 11 years after death
description: Wales' World Cup journey was started by the late manager, say fans on the anniversary of his death.

title: World Cup 2022: Fouling Neymar 'has to stop', Brazil coach Tite says
description: Brazil head coach Tite says the high number of fouls on Neymar "has to stop" after the forward was injured in their group-stage victory over Serbia.

title: Wales' class of 2022 endure a year to forget with World Cup looming
description: The 2022 fixture list is over for the Wales national team and not many will look back on it with fondness.

title: World Cup 2022: Wales' Allen backs Bale and Ramsey to shine in England game
description: Joe Allen says Gareth Bale and Aaron Ramsey can rise to the occasion when Wales face England knowing victory is essential for any chance of World Cup progress.

title: Matt Dawson column: 'It's unravelling for Jones - the RFU has a decision to make'
description: England are well short of the leading Rugby World Cup contenders. Any new coach would improve them. The Rugby Football Union now has a decision to make, says Matt Dawson.

title: Tory MP Bridgen to fight possible suspension
description: The cross-party committee found Andrew Bridgen had displayed a "very cavalier" attitude to the rules.

title: Bournemouth make Gary O'Neil manager on permanent basis
description: Bournemouth appoint Gary O'Neil as their manager on a permanent basis following his spell as interim boss.

title: World Cup 2022: Japan 0-1 Costa Rica - Keysher Fuller earns shock win
description: Japan fail to take another step towards the World Cup knockout rounds as Keysher Fuller's late goal earns Costa Rica a smash-and-grab Group E victory.

title: Trailblazer Doddie Weir's MND legacy 'will live on'
description: Doddie Weir's friends and family say the former rugby hero's charity work will continue after his death.

title: At the scene of deadly Ischia mudslide
description: The BBC's Mark Lowen surveys the damage to homes and cars after a mudslide on the Italian island.

title: World Cup 2022: Keysher Fuller goal fires Costa Rica to victory against Japan
description: Watch the moment Costa Rica defender Keysher Fuller scores his side's winning goal against Japan in their Group E match against Saudi Arabia at the World Cup.

title: World Cup: Bonnie Tyler holding out for Wales hero in Qatar
description: The singer hopes Wales can make the final 16 as a mathematician Hannah Fry crunches the numbers.

title: China Covid: Shocking protests are huge challenge for China's leaders
description: China's rulers appear to have drastically underestimated growing discontent at Xi Jinping's zero-Covid policy.

title: Man found dead with 'hazardous substances' in Shevington named
description: The body of Liam Smith was found on a street covered in unidentified substances, police say.

title: Gwent Police horrified by racism claims, says commissioner
description: The suicide of Ricky Jones revealed a series of allegedly racist and sexist texts among officers.

title: World Cup 2022: Jurgen Klinsmann to speak to Carlos Queiroz after row
description: Jurgen Klinsmann says he wants to speak to Carlos Queiroz to "calm things down" after the Iran manager said the German's criticism of his team was a "disgrace to football".

title: World Cup: Wales fans drunk on atmosphere in Qatar
description: A lack of alcohol and all games in one city are described as the Qatar World Cup's great strengths.

title: Cost of living: The breakfast club easing the strain
description: Residents in a housing estate in County Antrim are accessing low-cost hot meals run by a local group.

title: Head of the Royal Navy defends handling of rape allegations
description: Adm Sir Ben Key says independent investigations into complaints would "lead to less good outcomes".

title: Desert Island Discs: Blanchett, Spielberg and Young to appear on festive specials
description: Cate Blanchett, Steven Spielberg and Kirsty Young will appear in series of specials in December.

title: Covid protests widen in China after 10 killed in flats fire
description: Videos on social media appear to show some protesters asking leader Xi Jinping to resign.

title: Venezuela takes first step out of political stalemate
description: The government and opposition agree that billions of dollars frozen abroad be released to help fund social projects.

title: David Stirling: The rogue soldier who created the SAS
description: David Stirling, the Scot known as the founder of the SAS, was not what you would expect of a military hero.

title: Diphtheria cases rising among asylum seekers
description: The number of cases among those to have recently arrived in the UK exceeds 50, the BBC understands.

title: Charles V: French scientists decode 500-year-old letter
description: A French team has decoded a letter from Charles V, revealing rumours of an assassination plot.

title: Ukraine conflict: How much damage has Russia done to power supplies?
description: Russian air strikes have hit power supplies and health services, putting millions of lives at risk.

title: Jyoti Bhatt: The photographer who preserved rural Indian life
description: Jyoti Bhatt documented the nuances of rural Indian culture that are on the cusp of disappearing.

title: South Africa pit bull attacks: 'We can't live in a world where dogs eat children'
description: Anger mounts after the killing of children, including Keketso Saule, by pit bulls in South Africa.

title: Dread Broadcasting Corporation: The pirate that changed British radio
description: Europe's first dedicated black music station, Dread Broadcasting Corporation

title: Cost of living: 'Each week, we are fighting to survive'
description: Stacey McDonnell and Darren Setford live in Leicester and are full-time carers for family members.

title: Climate change: Could centuries-old wheat help feed the planet?
description: Scientists are searching through a museum's wheat collection to find the crop of the future.

title: Two boys, 16, die after being stabbed a mile apart in London
description: Due to the closeness and timings of the incidents, police say they are trying to establish if they are linked.

title: The papers: 'Thousands in 12-hour A&E wait' and Brexit 'blow'
description: The Sunday Telegraph reports about 4,000 patients a day are waiting more than 12 hours in A&E.

title: Camilla scraps ladies-in-waiting in modernising move
description: The Queen Consort is ending the traditional title of ladies-in-waiting for assistants at events.
